macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Reaches Historic High Near $88,000
items.summary: Bitcoin began 2026 at record levels, trading around $88,000 driven by strong institutional and retail investor demand, approval of Bitcoin ETFs, and growing confidence in Bitcoin as 'digital gold.' The cryptocurrency traded between $87,250 and $89,200 over the past 24 hours.
items.source: Sergey Tereshkin Publications / Binance Market Update

items.title: Global Cryptocurrency Market Cap Stands at $2.97 Trillion
items.summary: The total cryptocurrency market capitalization reached $2.97 trillion, down 0.75% over the past 24 hours, with mixed performance across major cryptocurrencies.

items.title: Ethereum and Major Altcoins Show Mixed Performance
items.summary: Ethereum traded at $2,984.25 (up 0.37%), while other major altcoins showed varied movements: Solana down 0.68%, Cardano down 2.75%, and Dogecoin down 1.69% over the past 24 hours.

items.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum ETF Approvals Drive Institutional Investment
items.summary: Approval of Bitcoin and Ethereum exchange-traded funds has attracted record institutional investment volumes, with major financial companies including BlackRock, Fidelity, and JPMorgan expanding their crypto-related services.

items.title: Global Regulatory Framework Developments
items.summary: The U.S. is advancing the CLARITY Act for crypto regulation, the EU is implementing MiCA regulation for uniform market rules, and Asian markets including Japan, Singapore, and South Korea are creating favorable crypto infrastructure.

items.title: DeFi and Smart Contract Platforms Expand Ecosystems
items.summary: Smart contract platforms including BNB, Solana, Cardano, and Polkadot are expanding their ecosystems, while next-generation blockchains like Solana and Avalanche continue attracting projects with fast transaction capabilities.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Top 10 Video Games Releasing in January 2026
items.summary: 2026 kicks off with a strong lineup of video game releases, featuring more indie titles alongside AAA games. Notable releases include Streetdog BMX, a cycling sports game with BMX tricks and challenges.

items.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Games Coming in January & February 2026
items.summary: Animal Crossing: New Horizons Nintendo Switch 2 Edition launches January 15th with enhanced resolution and mouse controls, followed by Dynasty Warriors: Origins on January 22nd. A free update is also coming to the original Switch version.

items.title: January 2026 Game Releases Include Code Vein II and More
items.summary: January 2026 features a lighter but still substantial release schedule with titles including Code Vein II, Escape from Ever After, Highguard, and Hermit and Pig.

items.title: Cloud Gaming Coverage and CES 2026 Announcements Expected
items.summary: Gaming media outlets are preparing coverage of CES 2026 in Las Vegas, with expectations for cloud gaming announcements from Nvidia and other major industry players.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
